     Nov 14, 2017 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Announces Third Quarter 2017 Results and Provides Operations Update 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER 2017 RESULTS AND PROVIDES OPERATIONS UPDATE Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States. SASKATOON, SK (CNW–November 14, 2017) - Karnalyte Resources Inc. ("Karnalyte" or the "Company") (TSX: KRN) today filed condensed unaudited interim financial statements and Management's Discussion and Analysis ("MD&A") for the three months ended September ...  Read More 
 
                                             
     Nov 1, 2017 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. – Received Statement of Claim Filed by Former Employee 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. Received statement of claim filed by Former Employee Saskatoon, SK (CNW–November 1, 2017) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or the “Company”) (TSX: KRN) announced today that the Company has received a statement of claim filed by Mr. Siu Ma, the Company’s former Chief Operating Officer, in the amount of $728,750. Mr. Ma’s claim is for an alleged ...  Read More

     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Announces Second Quarter 2017 Results and Provides Operations Update 
 
     KARNALYTE RESOURCES INC. ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER 2017 RESULTS AND PROVIDES OPERATIONS UPDATE Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States. SASKATOON, SK (CNW–AUGUST 10, 2017) - Karnalyte Resources Inc. ("Karnalyte" or the "Company") (TSX: KRN) today filed condensed unaudited interim financial statements and Management's Discussion and Analysis ("MD&A") for the six months ended June ...
